name: Go punk on your school and get the girl!
name_original: Go punk on your school and get the girl!
description:
Oh this is one of these clichéd get-your-girl stories alright -

But you better get moving, 'cause you're on a timer and this punk-a$s b!tch needs your Le$bean a$s to get groving and get some f*cking attention from your crush!

Yeah, what are you going to do? Cause mayhem, you psycho! This is your last chance to make a BAD impression, and capture the heart of the girl in your dreams.

Oh, but watch out for the teacher, she's not evil or anything, but she can only look away for so long before she's gonna need to haul your a$s on the street...

What? - Oh why you're only acting on your last day?

Oh, shoulda, coulda, woulda, she's the girl o' your dreams! GO GET HER!



*this game may or may not contain foul language...


Credits:
Game Dev : Christian Kohlstock
3D : Vincent Francois
VA Teacher : Anni3mon
VA Crush : Alessandra Thill
VA Main Character : Luc Macht
Textures : Vincent Francois, Alessandra Thill
